name: GRO and Wash Hair Value Set
about: What it is: A hair wellness value kit with a full-size Shampoo, Conditioner, and Serum to set your routine from shower to finish for thicker, fuller, healthier-looking hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Color Safe.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Thinning..Key Benefits: - Reduces signs of shedding.- Strengthens hair to reduce breakage.- Leaves hair looking and feeling fuller..Highlighted Ingredients:- Red Clover and Mung Bean Blend: Promotes thicker, fuller, healthier-looking hair from the root..- Biomimetic Peptides and Caffeine: Stimulates and nourishes the scalp..- Biotin: Strengthens hair to reduce breakage...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This full-size trio features Vegamour's bestselling essentials that reduce signs of shedding, provide antioxidant protection, and leave strands stronger and more resilient. Start with GRO Revitalizing Shampoo and Conditioner to gently cleanse and strengthen strands. Apply GRO Hair Serum to wet or dry strands daily for thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair in as soon as 90 days.*..Fragrance Description: A fresh, citrusy blend with soft floral undertones..Clinical Results: In a 120-day consumer perception study of 40 participants using GRO Hair Serum once daily:.- 93% saw less shedding.- 83% said their hair was stronger and more resilient.- 90% saw an improvement in the appearance of their hair..This Set Contains:- 8 oz/ 236 mL GRO Revitalizing Shampoo.- 8 oz/ 236 mL GRO Revitalizing Conditioner.- 1 oz/ 30 mL GRO Hair Serum..Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness
ingredients: GRO Revitalizing Shampoo: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Fragrance/Parfum, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Chloride, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Decyl Glucoside, Panthenol, Mannitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Glycerin, Biotin, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, sr-(Spider Polypeptide-1 Oligopeptide-178), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Ceramide NP, Sorbitan Oleate, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Citric Acid, Caffeine, Xanthan Gum, Alanine, Cetrimonium Chloride, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Linalyl Acetate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tromethamine, Hydrochloric Acid, Dipotassium Phosphate, Potassium Phosphate, Serine, Valine, Threonine, Isoleucine, Proline, Phytosphingosine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-9, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-86, Nicotiana Benthamiana Octapeptide-30 sh-Oligopeptide-2...GRO Revitalizing Conditioner: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) Resin Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Fragrance/Parfum, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Biotin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Mannitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Polyquaternium-7, Polyquaternium-73, Glycerin, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, sr-(Spider Polypeptide-1 Oligopeptide-178), Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Callus Conditioned Media, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Glyceryl Behenate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Linalyl Acetate, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ceramide NP, Sodium Chloride, Sorbitan Oleate, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Xanthan Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Phytosphingosine, Phytic Acid, (Trifolium Pratense (Clover)/Vigna Radiata) Sprout Extract...GRO Hair Serum: Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caffeine, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Callus Conditioned Media, Citrus Bergamia Peel Oil Expressed, Sodium Phytate, Pentylene Glycol, Limonene, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Lactic Acid, (Trifolium Pratense (Clover)/Vigna Radiata) Sprout Extract, Linalool, Sodium Hydroxide, Biotin, Alcohol, Phytic Acid, Linalyl Acetate, Pinene, Nicotiana Benthamiana Octapeptide-30 sh-Oligopeptide-2, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-9, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-86
how_to_use: GRO Revitalizing Shampoo & Conditioner:.-Lather a quarter-size amount of shampoo onto wet hair from scalp to ends..-Massage in..-Leave in for one minute. Rinse..-After shampooing, apply a quarter-size amount of conditioner onto wet hair from scalp to ends..-Massage in..-Leave in for two minutes. Rinse....GRO Hair Serum:.-Fill dropper and apply serum directly to scalp..-Massage in..-Use on wet or dry hair. Do not rinse..-Use daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a couple samples and fell in love, so I purchased the full size. Nothing has made my hair feel as wonderful as this product does.  I do have extremely thin hair, but I do have a lot of it, so I can't speak to its properties for thinning hair. But honestly, I love this product so much it wouldn't matter to me either way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this product allowed my hair growth to become faster. I really wanted more growth on top on my head but it is slowly getting there. I have some before and after.
